settings.name: Focus Mode
settings.description: Selects the focus method to suit the movement of the subject

settings.name: Focus Area
settings.description: Selects the area of focus

settings.name: AF Tracking Sensitivity
settings.description: Sets the AF tracking sensitivity for still image mode

settings.name: AF-C Setup
settings.description: Access to detailed settings for Continuous AF

settings.name: Focus Area Limit
settings.description: Limits the types of focus area settings available for selection

settings.name: Switch V/H AF Area
settings.description: Sets whether to adjust focus area position based on camera orientation

settings.name: Focus Area Color
settings.description: Sets the color of the frame indicating the focusing area

settings.name: AF Area Registration
settings.description: Sets whether to register the focus area to a custom button for quick recall

settings.name: Del. Regist. AF Area
settings.description: Deletes the registered focus area position

settings.name: AF Area Auto Clear
settings.description: Sets whether the focus area is displayed all the time or disappears after focus is achieved

settings.name: AF-C Area Display
settings.description: Sets whether to display the focus area in continuous AF mode

settings.name: Disp. AF Area during Trck
settings.description: Sets whether to display the focusing area in tracking mode

settings.name: Phase Detect. Area
settings.description: Sets whether to display phase detection AF area

settings.name: Circ. of Focus Point
settings.description: Sets whether to allow the focus point to move from one end to the other when moving the focus area

settings.name: AF Frame Move Amt
settings.description: Sets the distance to move the focus area frame

settings.name: Face/Eye Prior. in AF
settings.description: Sets whether to detect faces or eyes inside the focus area and focus on them

settings.name: Face/Eye Subject
settings.description: Selects the type of subject to detect for face/eye priority

settings.name: Right/Left Eye Select
settings.description: Sets whether to focus on the right or left eye when face/eye priority is active

settings.name: Face/Eye Frame Disp.
settings.description: Sets whether to display the face/eye detection frame

settings.name: Subject Recognition
settings.description: Sets the subjects to be detected

settings.name: Focus Map
settings.description: Provides a visual indicator of depth that highlights in-focus areas for precise focus

settings.name: Auto Focus
settings.description: Access to detailed auto focus settings

settings.name: Focus Assist
settings.description: Access to focus assistance settings

settings.name: Focus Magnifier
settings.description: Enlarges the image to check focus

settings.name: Focus Magnif. Time
settings.description: Sets the length of time the image will be shown magnified

settings.name: Initial Focus Mag.
settings.description: Sets the initial magnification scale when using the focus magnifier

settings.name: Peaking Display
settings.description: Sets the peaking function which enhances the outline of in-focus areas during manual focus

settings.name: Peaking Level
settings.description: Sets the level of peaking enhancement

settings.name: Peaking Color
settings.description: Sets the color used for the peaking enhancement

settings.name: Focus Bracket
settings.description: Takes multiple images with different focus positions, useful for focus stacking
